original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.

enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a crucial bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen, analytical skills, and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business requirements and operate at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging cutting-edge machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive process improvements and streamline operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to derive meaningful insights from data to drive process improvements

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to effectively configure and maintain the [mention specific system] backend
- Understanding of Agile methodologies, which will be crucial in adapting to changing business needs and delivering iterative solutions

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and optimizing machine learning and artificial intelligence solutions to enhance business processes
- A track record of success in roles that required the translation of business requirements into technical configurations and system enhancements

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems, which will provide a valuable foundation for understanding the unique challenges and requirements of this domain
- Familiarity with Agile project management and development practices, which will enable you to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] backend configuration and management
- SQL and data analysis tools (e.g., SQL Server, Tableau, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Azure ML)
- Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Emphasis on continuous improvement and the implementation of innovative solutions
- Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced, dynamic setting

Role Overview:
This role is a unique opportunity to blend your technical expertise with a deep understanding of business processes and requirements. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring that our [mention specific system] backend accurately reflects the needs of our organization and operates at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on leveraging cutting-edge machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to streamline vehicle configuration processes, drive process improvements, and enhance overall system performance.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and translate them into effective technical configurations
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for the [mention specific system] backend, ensuring that all data mappings, integrations, and configurations are aligned with business needs
- Implement and test new configurations, troubleshoot and resolve any configuration-related issues, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure seamless system performance
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Collaborate with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations
- Continuously seek opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through the implementation of innovative configuration changes and best practices
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support knowledge sharing and future enhancements

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and devise effective, data-driven solutions
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to derive meaningful insights from data to drive process improvements and system enhancements

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, which will be crucial for configuring and maintaining the [mention specific system] backend
- Understanding of Agile methodologies, which will allow you to adapt to changing business needs and deliver iterative solutions

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated track record of success in roles that required the translation of business requirements into technical configurations and system enhancements
- Experience in implementing and optimizing machine learning and artificial intelligence solutions to improve business processes

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems, which will provide a valuable foundation for understanding the unique challenges and requirements of this domain
- Familiarity with Agile project management and development practices, which will enable you to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] backend configuration and management
- SQL and data analysis tools (e.g., SQL Server, Tableau, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Azure ML)
- Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Emphasis on continuous improvement and the implementation of innovative, data-driven solutions
- Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced, dynamic setting

Role Overview:
This Java Developer role is crucial in driving the development and maintenance of robust backend systems that power mission-critical applications. As a key member of the engineering team, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimizing high-performance, scalable, and secure RESTful services using the latest Java technologies and frameworks. Your contributions will be instrumental in enhancing the overall reliability, efficiency, and scalability of the organization's backend infrastructure.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and develop scalable and efficient RESTful APIs and microservices using Java, Spring, and Spring Boot
- Implement secure authentication and authorization mechanisms using Spring Security
- Participate in the analysis, design, and documentation of technical requirements and solutions
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code that adheres to industry best practices
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and delivery of backend components
- Proactively identify and resolve performance bottlenecks and system issues
- Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and tooling
- Provide technical mentorship and guidance to junior team members

Required Skills:
- Proficient in Java programming and its core concepts, design patterns, and best practices
- Extensive experience with Spring, Spring Boot, and Spring Security frameworks
- Strong understanding of RESTful API design principles and web service development
- Familiarity with microservices architecture and event-driven design patterns
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to tackle complex technical challenges
- Ability to write clean, well-documented, and testable code
- Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with distributed systems, message queuing, and event-driven architectures
- Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker) and orchestration platforms (e.g., Kubernetes)
- Knowledge of database technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL) and their integration with Java applications
- Exposure to Agile methodologies and DevOps practices

Required Experience:
- 3+ years of hands-on experience in Java application development
- Proven track record of designing and implementing scalable and maintainable backend systems
- Experience in developing and deploying RESTful services and microservices
- Familiarity with continuous integration and deployment processes

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with cloud-based infrastructure and deployment (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
- Familiarity with logging, monitoring, and observability tools and practices
- Exposure to performance optimization and tuning techniques for Java applications

Tools & Technologies:
- Java, Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Security
- RESTful API development, microservices architecture
- Git, CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, Travis CI)
- Database technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL)
- Containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes)
- Logging and monitoring tools (e.g., ELK, Prometheus, Grafana)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and agile development environment
- Participation in code reviews, pair programming, and knowledge-sharing sessions
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and best practices
- Ability to work independently and as part of a cross-functional team
- Commitment to delivering high-quality, maintainable, and secure code

Role Overview:
As a Java Developer, you will play a pivotal role in building and maintaining robust, scalable, and secure backend systems that power the organization's mission-critical applications. Your expertise in Java and related frameworks will be instrumental in designing and implementing efficient RESTful services and microservices that form the backbone of the company's technology infrastructure. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and delivery of backend components, contributing to the overall reliability and performance of the system.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and develop high-performance, scalable, and secure RESTful APIs and microservices using Java, Spring, and Spring Boot
- Implement secure authentication and authorization mechanisms leveraging Spring Security
- Participate in the analysis, design, and documentation of technical requirements and solutions
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code that adheres to industry best practices and coding standards
- Collaborate with other teams (e.g., frontend, DevOps) to ensure seamless integration and delivery of backend components
- Proactively identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, system issues, and technical debt
- Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes, tooling, and infrastructure
- Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members

Required Skills:
- Extensive experience in Java programming, including a deep understanding of its core concepts, design patterns, and best practices
- Proficiency in the Spring ecosystem, particularly Spring, Spring Boot, and Spring Security
- Strong understanding of RESTful API design principles and web service development
- Familiarity with microservices architecture and event-driven design patterns
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to tackle complex technical challenges
- Ability to write clean, well-documented, and testable code that adheres to industry standards
- Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with distributed systems, message queuing, and event-driven architectures
- Knowledge of containerization technologies (e.g., Docker) and orchestration platforms (e.g., Kubernetes)
- Familiarity with database technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL) and their integration with Java applications
- Exposure to Agile methodologies and DevOps practices

Required Experience:
- 3+ years of hands-on experience in Java application development
- Proven track record of designing and implementing scalable, maintainable, and secure backend systems
- Experience in developing and deploying RESTful services and microservices
- Familiarity with continuous integration and deployment processes

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with cloud-based infrastructure and deployment (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
- Familiarity with logging, monitoring, and observability tools and practices
- Exposure to performance optimization and tuning techniques for Java applications

Tools & Technologies:
- Java, Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Security
- RESTful API development, microservices architecture
- Git, CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, Travis CI)
- Database technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL)
- Containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes)
- Logging and monitoring tools (e.g., ELK, Prometheus, Grafana)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and agile development environment
- Participation in code reviews, pair programming, and knowledge-sharing sessions
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and best practices
- Ability to work independently and as part of a cross-functional team
- Commitment to delivering high-quality, maintainable, and secure code that aligns with the organization's technical roadmap and business objectives

Role Overview:
This Principal Software Engineer role is instrumental in shaping the future of diagnostic data management and integration. You will join a team of talented engineers dedicated to tackling the complex challenges of fragmented data across disparate systems. Your expertise in designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications and services will be crucial in creating enterprise-level software solutions that bridge the gaps in this data landscape. As a technical leader, you will guide the team towards successful project execution, ensuring seamless integration and continuous improvement of the software stack.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and deliver high-quality, scalable, supportable, and extensible software applications
- Ensure seamless integration of the software stack with the existing CI pipeline, contributing to continuous improvements
- Collaborate with software architects on deployment architecture for optimal stability, performance, and security
- Craft robust relational data models, RESTful APIs, and implement message broker-based distributed architectures
- Leverage both relational and NoSQL databases to address diverse data storage and processing requirements
- Understand sophisticated workflows and effectively work with globally distributed teams
- Contribute to the ongoing improvement of processes and operations, ensuring the highest standards in software development

Required Skills:
- Proficiency in Java, Spring Boot, and JPA
- Expertise in designing and developing scalable web applications and services
- Strong understanding of relational data modeling, REST API design, and distributed architectures
- Familiarity with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ and Spring AMQP)
- Ability to work effectively with both relational and NoSQL databases
- Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills to tackle complex data integration challenges
- Effective communication and collaboration skills to work with globally distributed teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience developing regulated products under design control
- Familiarity with virtualization, containers, and orchestration platforms (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
- Curiosity in bioinformatics analysis and computational pipelines
- Experience with GitHub actions and DevOps automation tools (e.g., Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible)
- Passion for continuous improvement in software development processes and frameworks

Required Experience:
- Minimum 8 years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications and services
- Proven track record of successful project execution and collaboration with software architects
- Experience working in a globally distributed team environment

Preferred Experience:
- Master's degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline
- Experience developing and deploying production software using public cloud infrastructure, preferably AWS

Tools & Technologies:
- Java, Spring Boot, JPA
- Relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases
- Message brokers (RabbitMQ, Spring AMQP)
- Containerization and orchestration platforms (Docker, Kubernetes)
- DevOps automation tools (Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible)
- GitHub actions

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and fast-paced environment, with a focus on technical excellence and continuous improvement
- Participation in design reviews, code reviews, and cross-functional team meetings
- Commitment to delivering high-quality, scalable, and maintainable software solutions
- Willingness to adapt to evolving technologies and industry best practices

Role Overview:
As a Principal Software Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in revolutionizing the way diagnostic data is managed and integrated across the industry. Joining a team of passionate and talented engineers, you will tackle the challenge of fragmented data systems that were never designed to communicate with each other. Your expertise in designing and developing scalable, enterprise-level software solutions will be instrumental in creating seamless data pipelines and integrations that unlock the true potential of this valuable data. You will be a technical leader, guiding the team towards successful project execution and driving continuous improvements to the software stack.

Key Responsibilities:
- Architect and develop high-performance, scalable, and maintainable software applications that address complex data integration challenges
- Ensure the seamless integration of the software stack with the existing CI/CD pipeline, contributing to the continuous improvement of the development process
- Collaborate with software architects to design and implement deployment architectures that prioritize stability, performance, and security
- Craft robust relational data models, design RESTful APIs, and implement message broker-based distributed architectures to enable efficient data exchange
- Leverage both relational and NoSQL databases to address diverse data storage and processing requirements
- Understand complex workflows and effectively coordinate with globally distributed teams to deliver successful projects
- Actively contribute to the ongoing enhancement of software development processes and frameworks, ensuring the highest standards are met

Required Skills:
- Proficiency in Java, Spring Boot, and JPA for building scalable and maintainable applications
- Expertise in designing and developing enterprise-grade web applications and services
- Strong understanding of relational data modeling, RESTful API design, and message-driven distributed architectures
- Familiarity with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ, Spring AMQP) for reliable and scalable data exchange
- Ability to work with both relational and NoSQL databases to address diverse data storage and processing needs
- Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills to tackle complex data integration challenges
- Exceptional communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with globally distributed teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in developing regulated products under design control processes
- Familiarity with virtualization, containerization, and orchestration platforms (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
- Interest in bioinformatics analysis and computational pipelines
- Exposure to GitHub actions and DevOps automation tools (e.g., Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible)
- Passion for continuous improvement in software development practices and methodologies

Required Experience:
- Minimum 8 years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications and services
- Proven track record of successful project execution and collaboration with software architects
- Experience working in a globally distributed, cross-functional team environment

Preferred Experience:
- Master's degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline
- Experience in developing and deploying production software using public cloud infrastructure, preferably AWS

Tools & Technologies:
- Java, Spring Boot, JPA
- Relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases
- Message brokers (RabbitMQ, Spring AMQP)
- Containerization and orchestration platforms (Docker, Kubernetes)
- DevOps automation tools (Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible)
- GitHub actions

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment, with a focus on technical excellence and continuous improvement
- Active participation in design reviews, code reviews, and cross-functional team meetings
- Commitment to delivering high-quality, scalable, and maintainable software solutions that address complex data integration challenges
- Adaptability to evolving technologies and industry best practices in the software development domain

Role Overview:
This role is a crucial part of the engineering team, responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust full-stack applications. As a Senior Fullstack Developer, you will leverage your expertise in Java, Spring Boot, and Angular to drive the delivery of high-quality, scalable software solutions that meet the organization's business objectives. Your strong background in microservices architecture, database management, and mentorship will be instrumental in leading the team and ensuring the successful implementation of complex projects.

Key Responsibilities:
- Architect and implement feature-rich, scalable, and maintainable fullstack applications using Java, Spring Boot, and Angular
- Design and develop microservices-based solutions, ensuring seamless integration and communication between services
- Hands-on experience in working with MongoDB, Oracle, or other SQL/NoSQL databases to design and optimize data models
- Mentor and guide junior developers, sharing your knowledge and best practices to foster team growth and development
- Identify and deliver customer-centric value additions, continuously improving the software solutions
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers and designers, to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions
- Participate in code reviews, testing, and deployment processes to ensure high-quality, reliable, and secure applications

Required Skills:
- Proficient in Java and the Spring framework, with a deep understanding of core Java concepts and design patterns
- Extensive experience in building microservices-based architectures and integrating with various data sources
- Hands-on experience with Angular or other modern frontend frameworks, with a strong understanding of web development best practices
- Expertise in database management, including both SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Oracle)
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify and resolve complex technical challenges
- Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in implementing DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure management
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development
- Knowledge of containerization technologies, such as Docker, and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes
- Proficiency in performance optimization techniques and tools to ensure high-performing applications

Required Experience:
- Minimum 10 years of experience in full-stack software development, with a strong focus on Java and Spring technologies
- At least 5 years of hands-on experience in working with MongoDB, Oracle, or other SQL/NoSQL databases
- Proven track record of leading and mentoring teams in the delivery of complex, enterprise-level software projects

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in working with microservices-based architectures and integrating with various external systems
- Familiarity with Agile software development methodologies and their implementation
- Prior experience in a technical leadership role, guiding and mentoring junior developers

Tools & Technologies:
- Java, Spring Framework, Spring Boot
- Angular or other modern frontend frameworks
- MongoDB, Oracle, SQL, and NoSQL databases
- IntelliJ IDEA or other leading IDEs
- Microservices architecture and design patterns
- CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, GitHub Actions)
- Containerization and orchestration platforms (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)

- Collaborative and agile work environment, with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation

- Commitment to delivering high-quality, reliable, and secure software solutions

Role Overview:
As a Senior Fullstack Developer, you will play a pivotal role in the engineering team, responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining cutting-edge web applications that drive the organization's growth and success. With your expertise in Java, Spring Boot, and Angular, you will be at the forefront of building scalable, performant, and feature-rich software solutions. Your strong background in microservices architecture and database management will enable you to architect and implement robust, resilient, and maintainable systems that meet the evolving business needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and develop complex, full-stack applications using Java, Spring Boot, and Angular, ensuring adherence to best practices and industry standards
- Architect and implement microservices-based solutions, fostering seamless integration and communication between services
- Hands-on experience in working with MongoDB, Oracle, or other SQL/NoSQL databases to design, optimize, and maintain data models
- Mentor and guide junior developers, sharing your technical expertise and industry knowledge to help them grow and excel
- Continuously identify and deliver customer-centric value additions, iterating on existing solutions to improve functionality and user experience
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers and designers, to understand requirements and translate them into technical specifications
- Participate in code reviews, testing, and deployment processes to ensure the delivery of high-quality, secure, and reliable applications

Required Skills:
- Proficient in Java and the Spring framework, with a deep understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns
- Extensive experience in designing and implementing microservices-based architectures, with a strong grasp of integration patterns and distributed system design
- Hands-on expertise in building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications using Angular or other leading frontend frameworks
- Adept at database management, including both SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Oracle), with the ability to design and optimize data models
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to identify and address complex technical challenges
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in implementing DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure management
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in an iterative software development lifecycle
- Knowledge of containerization technologies, such as Docker, and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes
- Proficiency in performance optimization techniques and tools to ensure high-performing, scalable applications

Required Experience:
- Minimum 10 years of experience in full-stack software development, with a strong focus on Java and Spring technologies
- At least 5 years of hands-on experience in working with MongoDB, Oracle, or other SQL/NoSQL databases
- Proven track record of leading and mentoring teams in the successful delivery of complex, enterprise-level software projects

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in working with microservices-based architectures and integrating with various external systems
- Familiarity with Agile software development methodologies and their implementation in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Prior experience in a technical leadership role, guiding and mentoring junior developers to achieve their full potential

Tools & Technologies:
- Java, Spring Framework, Spring Boot
- Angular or other modern frontend frameworks
- MongoDB, Oracle, SQL, and NoSQL databases
- IntelliJ IDEA or other leading IDEs
- Microservices architecture and design patterns
- CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, GitHub Actions)
- Containerization and orchestration platforms (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and agile work environment, with a focus on continuous learning, innovation, and problem-solving
- Active participation in code reviews, pair programming, and knowledge-sharing sessions to foster a culture of excellence
- Ability to work in a distributed team setup, with potential for remote work or onsite collaboration
- Willingness to take on challenging technical problems and find creative, scalable solutions
- Commitment to delivering high-quality, reliable, and secure software solutions that drive the organization's success
